snippet: Republicans plan to start the new year by introducing a right-to-work measure that would prohibit private-sector labor unions from requiring workers to pay dues.
lead_paragraph: Republicans plan to start the new year by introducing a right-to-work measure that would prohibit private-sector labor unions from requiring workers to pay dues.

headline.main: Wisconsin: G.O.P. Will Target Union Dues
headline.print_headline: Wisconsin: G.O.P. Will Target Union Dues
